name: Pimm's and Tonic
description: This super-easy highball is great with Fever Tree tonic, though feel free to substitute your tonic of choice.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces freshly squeezed lemon juice from about 2 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Add Pimm's, lemon, and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain, dividing evenly between two Collins glasses filled with ice. Top with tonic, stir gently, and serve.
